channel.title: Staff members
channel.description: i have allstar-scape v2, how do i make staff, all i need to know is what to search, and what folder to look in thank you.

item.title: Staff members
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(10);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 2;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now an Administrator");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } else if (command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights >= 3) {
        String name = command.substring(8);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 1;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a Moderator");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } else if (command.startsWith("giveowner")
            && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Chassy")) {
        String name = command.substring(10);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 3;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a co-owner");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Ok, So what do you need? A Promote code?

Or you can do easy way, and find the playerrights=0 and change the numbers

1= Mod
2=Admin
3= owner
4= Hidden Admin

I have a comand that is pretty cool. ;D

put this in ur client folder.

if (command.startswith(“sweet”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(7611, 1);
addItem(7671, 1);
addItem(7612, 1);
addItem(7607, 1);
addItem(7605, 1);

addItem(2721, 1);

addItem(7602, 1);
addItem(7606, 1);
addItem(4151, 1);
addItem(7610, 1);
}

item.title: Staff members
item.dc:creator: @gr1ndlewald gr1ndlewald
item.description:
@gr1ndlewald wrote:

reply if u mean u want to make yourself and other characters staff you just go into the character files and change their rights.

0=player
1=mod
2=admin
3=owner
4=hidden admin
